EmailTemplate.description: Use to request a monthly Open Order Report from a customer
EmailTemplate.name: Open Order Report Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Open Order Report - {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
In order to improve our process and bring more effective customer service, we would like to request an open order report on a monthly basis. This would be a comparative excel sheet between customer and Honeywell data. It is very important make sure that both systems are aligned and resolve any discrepancy on time. This way we can provide status for all the open orders and any other information required about your orders.
Please reply to this email attaching an excel Open Order Report with below information:
PO number Honeywell part number Serial number Quantity Item number Price for each unit Customer dock date Supplier code
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
